mapper.select: select * from members where userId = #{userId} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into Members (userId, userPwd, checkPwd, nickName, firstName, lastName, phoneNo, pwdHintQ, pwdHint, userJob, gender) values (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{checkPwd}, #{nickName}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phoneNo}, #{pwdHintQ}, #{pwdHint}, #{userJob}, #{gender})
